Uses of Class
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.VirtualizedSystem

Packages that use VirtualizedSystem
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization   
 

Uses of VirtualizedSystem in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization that return VirtualizedSystem
static VirtualizedSystem Virtualization.getPhysicalSystem()
          Obtains a VirtualizedSystem representation of the physical System.
static VirtualizedSystem Virtualization.getSystem()
          Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread.
 VirtualizedSystem VirtualizedSystemClassLoader.getVirtualizedSystem()
          Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the ClassLoader.
static VirtualizedSystem Virtualization.getVirtualizedSystem()
          Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread or null if the Thread is not associated with a VirtualizedSystem.
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization with parameters of type VirtualizedSystem
static void Virtualization.associateThreadWith(VirtualizedSystem system)
          Associates the specified VirtualizedSystem with the calling Thread (if not already associated).
 OutputStream DelegatingStdOutOutputStream.getOutputStreamFor(VirtualizedSystem system)
          Obtains the OutputStream from the VirtualizedSystem to which output will be delegated.
 OutputStream DelegatingStdErrOutputStream.getOutputStreamFor(VirtualizedSystem system)
          Obtains the OutputStream from the VirtualizedSystem to which output will be delegated.
abstract  OutputStream AbstractDelegatingOutputStream.getOutputStreamFor(VirtualizedSystem system)
          Obtains the OutputStream from the VirtualizedSystem to which output will be delegated.
 

Constructors in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization with parameters of type VirtualizedSystem

          Constructs a VirtualizedSystem based on another VirtualizedSystem.

          Constructs a VirtualizedSystem based on another VirtualizedSystem.
VirtualizedSystemClassLoader(ClassLoader parent, VirtualizedSystem system)

VirtualizedSystemClassLoader(URL[] urls, ClassLoader parent, VirtualizedSystem system)
          Constructs a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader with the specified parent ClassLoader.
VirtualizedSystemClassLoader(VirtualizedSystem system)
          Constructs a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader with the parent ClassLoader being the current Thread context.
